item.description:
SO We ahve a place! Jeff has graciously allowed us to use his place - again! Thank you Jeff!

This time - Please bring a bit of food to share with the group. Thank you!

Donna

Bring a Print Night

Yep you heard us, time to show off your photography and printing skills! We are encouraging you all to take one of your favorite photos of all time and make a beautiful print. Then bring it along to the MeetUp and show it off to everyone.

I am still looking for a place to hold the meet up this month...so check back here soon to see where we will be headed! Or if anyone has any ideas please let me know...

Thank you all for making the swap meet so successful too! I saw money changing hands and folks walking out with smiles.

Cheers to you all! And see you next Meet Up!

Donna and Scotty
item.how_to_find_us: Scott and I are always to try to greet everyone who comes to the meetups. We'll find you!
item.why: We always have a fun, it's casual and laid back. Chat, hang out, talk photography, that's what we do...

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: The Worcester Photography June Meeting
